record.id: topic="Create Profiles for a New HP Service Manager Operator"
record.recordid: Create Profiles for a New HP Service Manager Operator
record.topic: Create Profiles for a New HP Service Manager Operator

text.text: Use this template to add a new HP Service Manager operator.
Select an operator from the list that has most of the privileges and capabilities you want your new user to have.
Then just follow the instructions to add profiles
for each HP Service Manager environment, to subscribe to the appropriate assignment and message groups and to define the new user's "HOME" page.
To view related help, focus on a subject and select Next. The Prev button displays the last help topic. To exit, select Cancel.
